text:
@George_Osborne @MattHancock As long as you don't lose sight of the fact that this needs to be repeated daily, it's not a one-off target.
Need to make sure this is ongoing, it's not a game, it's about preventing COVID-19 spreading and therefore saving lives #COVID19 #MattHancock #TestingTarget
